item.title: 赛诺菲与诺瓦维克斯签署价值 12 亿美元的疫苗许可协议
item.description: 赛诺菲和诺瓦维克斯公司签署了一项许可协议，其中包括将Covid-19和流感疫苗组合进行商业化。【原文：Sanofi and Novavax Inc. signed a licensing agreement that includes commercializing a combined Covid-19 and flu shot.】

item.title: 铂族金属价格影响利润，西班业正在商讨贷款契约问题
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd.表示，在铂族金属价格下跌拖累盈利后，该公司正在与贷款方商讨临时提高契约。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. said it’s talking to lenders about temporarily raising covenants after lower platinum-group metal prices weighed on earnings.】

item.title: KDDI 将回购丰田出让的 14 亿美元自有股份
item.description: KDDI 公司表示，计划以每股 3,896 日元的价格从丰田汽车公司回购价值高达 2,135 亿日元（14 亿美元）的自有股票。【原文：KDDI Corp. said it plans to buy back as much as ¥213.5 billion ($1.4 billion) worth of its own shares from Toyota Motor Corp. at ¥3,896 per share.】

item.title: 资通公司裁定印尼债务人在贷款问题上藐视法庭获胜
item.description: 新加坡法院裁定一名印尼商人在一笔 2 亿美元的私人信贷贷款中藐视法庭，战神管理公司（Ares Management Corp.【原文：Ares Management Corp. and Tor Investment Management won a Singaporean court ruling that found an Indonesian businessman in contempt over a $200 million private credit loan, marking a rare win for direct lenders grappling with legal complexities in Asia.】

item.title: 挪威4月份核心通货膨胀率降幅低于预期
item.description: 挪威上个月的基本通胀率降幅低于分析师的预期，这可能会降低人们对挪威央行将在今年首次降息的预期。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate fell less than analysts expected last month, likely reducing expectations that the central bank will deliver its first interest-rate cut this year.】

item.title: 本田预计利润增长稳健，并表示将回购更多股票
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）预测，由于混合动力汽车和两轮车的需求稳健，本财年的利润将实现稳健增长，并表示将回购更多股票。【原文：Honda Motor Co. forecast firm profit growth in the current fiscal year on solid demand for hybrid vehicles and two wheelers and said it would buy back more of its shares.】

item.title: 英国称衰退已结束，经济增长强于预期
item.description: 英国从经济衰退中强劲反弹，这让至今仍在努力兑现经济增长承诺的首相苏纳克（Rishi Sunak）稍稍松了一口气。【原文：Britain bounced back strongly from a recession, providing some relief for Prime Minister Rishi Sunak who has so far struggled to deliver on his promise to grow the economy.】

item.title: 欧盟债券吸引投资者押注加入主权指数
item.description: 资金经理们正纷纷涌入欧盟债券，因为他们预计欧盟的地位将发生重大转变，从而向更多的投资者开放欧盟的债务。【原文：Money managers are piling into the European Union’s bonds in anticipation of a major shift in their status that would open up the bloc’s debt to a bigger pool of investors.】

item.title: 日元疲软导致日本商人情绪跌至 20 个月来最低点
item.description: 由于担心日元疲软对进口和消费者的影响，日本商人的情绪在 4 月份降至 20 个月以来的最低点。【原文：The mood among Japanese merchants fell in April to the lowest in 20 months as concerns mounted over the weak yen’s impact on imports and consumers.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国经济走出衰退，实现 2021 年以来最快增长
item.description: 2024 年 1 月 23 日星期二，英国伦敦金融城的摩天办公大楼。金融区的一场静悄悄的革命将夷平道路，安装更宽的人行道、新的自行车道以及更多的公共广场和开放空间，以方便行人。摄影师：何塞-萨门托-马托斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Skyscraper office blocks in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, Jan. 23, 2024. A quiet revolution in the financial district will rip out roadways and install wider sidewalks, new bike lanes and more public squares and open spaces friendly to pedestrians. Photographer: Jose Sarmento Matos/Bloomberg】

item.title: 宽松购房政策势头强劲，中国房地产股大涨
item.description: 在两个主要城市取消住宅购买限制后，中国开发商股票连续第二天反弹，从而提振了对更多地方政府将效仿的乐观情绪。【原文：Chinese developer stocks rallied for a second day after two major cities scrapped restrictions on residential property purchases, boosting optimism that more local governments will follow suit.】

item.title: 澳新银行称中国人民银行可能进行债券交易以摆脱对银行的依赖
item.description: 据澳大利亚&新西兰银行集团称，中国人民银行可能会买卖政府债券—，但这并不是为了实行量化宽松政策，而是为了摆脱对银行向金融系统输送现金的依赖。【原文：The People’s Bank of China will likely buy and sell government bonds — not as a move toward quantitative easing, but to shake off a reliance on banks for funneling cash to the financial system, according to Australia & New Zealand Banking Group.】

item.title: 花旗基于基本面因素下调中国股市评级至中性，上调印度股市评级至中性
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的策略师写道，尽管基本面恶化，但中国股市近期仍出现反弹，而印度则实现了稳健的利润，他们在新兴市场配置中下调了中国的评级，并上调了印度的评级。【原文：The recent rebound in Chinese stocks has come despite worsening fundamentals, while India is delivering solid profits, Citigroup Inc. strategists wrote, downgrading China and upgrading India in emerging market allocation.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲

item.title: 铜价突破 10,000 美元，供应担忧抵消需求疲软的影响
item.description: 铜价攀升至每吨 10,000 美元以上，原因是预测全球供应将趋紧，电动汽车和电网的消费量将上升，这与第一大需求国中国需求减少的迹象相抵消。【原文：Copper climbed above $10,000 a ton as predictions for tighter global supplies and rising consumption in electric vehicles and power grids countered signs of demand destruction in top user China.】

item.title: 中国股市相对香港股市的折价可能正在迅速消失
item.description: 在香港上市的中国公司与内地同类公司相比的交易折让大幅下降，原因是潜在的税收减免和岛内市场复苏的希望。【原文：The trading discount that Chinese companies listed in Hong Kong offer compared to their mainland peers has fallen sharply, driven by a potential tax waiver and hopes of a market revival on the island.】

item.title: 为什么每个人都相信自己想相信的东西？
item.description:
伦敦商学院教授亚历克斯-埃德曼斯（Alex Edmans）告诉Merryn Talks Money，为什么他认为统计数据和研究利用了有关ESG和首席执行官薪酬的预先存在的偏见。【原文：

London Business School professor Alex Edmans tells Merryn Talks Money why he thinks statistics and studies exploit pre-existing biases on ESG and CEO pay.

】

item.title: 澳大利亚最大谷物产区的温暖天气引发对作物的担忧
item.description: 据一份月度行业报告称，随着作物播种工作的继续，西澳大利亚部分地区持续的干旱天气引发了人们对下一季前景的担忧。【原文：Persistent dry weather in parts of Western Australia has raised concerns over the outlook for the upcoming season as crop planting continues, according to a monthly industry report.】

item.title: 美国石油的再次涌入导致欧洲原油价格下跌
item.description: 美国石油出口的新一轮爆发再次压低了从欧洲到西非的原油实物价格，在需求旺季即将到来之际为消费者提供了潜在的宽慰。【原文：A fresh burst of US oil exports is once again depressing prices of physical crudes from Europe to West Africa, offering a potential relief to consumers as the peak demand season is fast approaching.】

item.title: 大宗交易之王 "萨德勒在 Segantii 创造了 3.6 亿美元的财富
item.description: 西蒙-赛德勒将 Segantii 资本管理有限公司从一家初创的对冲基金公司发展成为市值 48 亿美元的巨头，并在香港建立了亚洲 "大宗交易之王 "的美誉。【原文：Simon Sadler turned Segantii Capital Management Ltd. from a tiny startup hedge fund into a $4.8 billion giant, cultivating a reputation as Asia’s “block-trade king” from his perch in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 香港上诉法院推翻北大方正Keepwell债券裁决
item.description: 香港一家法院推翻了早前的一项判决，裁定北京大学方正集团有限公司（中国学校的前商业部门）违反了其单位美元债券中承诺父母财政支持的保密条款。【原文：Peking University Founder Group Corp., the former commercial arm of the Chinese school, breached the keepwell provisions on its units’ dollar bonds that pledged parental financial support, a Hong Kong court ruled in overturning an earlier court decision.】

item.title: 中国建设银行因再保险欺诈损失在美国被起诉
item.description: 中国第三大商业银行中国建设银行股份有限公司在美国的一宗诉讼中被指控助长了再保险业的大规模欺诈行为，导致公司蒙受 "巨大损失 "和股价下跌。【原文：China Construction Bank Corp., the nation’s third-largest commercial lender, was accused in a US lawsuit of enabling a massive fraud in the reinsurance industry that left companies with “monumental losses” and sinking stock prices.】

item.title: 商界领袖称日本应将日元汇率目标区间定为 120
item.description: 一位全国性商业团体领导人表示，日本政府和央行应开始将汇率目标设定为 1 美元兑 120-130 日元，因为目前日元对陷入困境的小企业来说太弱了。【原文：Japan’s government and central bank should start targeting an exchange rate of 120-130 per dollar as the yen is currently far too weak for struggling small businesses, according to a national business group leader.】

item.title: 监管机构考虑豁免股息税，香港股市上涨
item.description: 香港股市上涨，因为据说监管机构正在考虑一项建议，即个人投资者通过 "股票通 "购买港股赚取的股息可免税。【原文：Hong Kong stocks gained as regulators were said to be considering a proposal to exempt individual investors from paying taxes on dividends earned from Hong Kong stocks bought via Stock Connect.】

item.title: PGA 巡回赛企业任命瓦莱罗公司的乔-戈德为主席
item.description: 美巡赛表示，乔-戈德（Joe Gorder）当选为美巡赛企业主席，该企业是美巡赛的商业企业，今年 1 月从一群美国投资者那里获得了高达 30 亿美元的资金。【原文：The PGA Tour said Joe Gorder was elected chairman of PGA TOUR Enterprises, its commercial venture that secured up to $3 billion of funding in January from a group of US investors.】

item.title: 瑞银考虑为推荐富客户的投资银行家发放奖金
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在考虑对向公司财富管理业务推荐客户的投资银行家实行奖励制度。【原文：UBS Group AG is considering introducing a reward system for investment bankers who refer clients to the firm’s wealth management business, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟企业对华投资热情降至历史最低点
item.description: 中国欧盟商会的一项调查显示，随着企业寻求规避地缘政治风险并转向东南亚和欧洲，中国作为投资首选国的地位正在失去光泽。【原文：China is losing its luster as a top country to invest in as firms seek to avoid geopolitical risks and turn to Southeast Asia and Europe, according to a survey by the European Union Chamber of Commerce in China.】

item.title: Vanguard 与 Pimco 一样认为日本央行加息次数多于市场预期
item.description: Vanguard Group Inc. 的 Ales Koutny 说，市场低估了日本央行今年需要采取多么鹰派的政策才能提振陷入困境的日元。【原文：Vanguard Group Inc.’s Ales Koutny says the market is underestimating just how hawkish the Bank of Japan will need to be this year to boost the beleaguered yen.】

item.title: 中国股市反弹具备更持久反弹的诸多特征
item.description: 基于技术面、资金流和盈利前景等一系列基本利好因素，中国股市可能还有反弹空间。【原文：China’s stock rebound may have room to run based on a number of underlying positives including technicals, fund flows, and the outlook for earnings.】

item.title: 摩根大通称印度指数纳入工作已步入正轨，大多数客户已准备就绪
item.description: 摩根大通指数研究部全球主管表示，摩根大通正按计划从 6 月起将印度纳入其新兴市场债务指数，其大多数客户已准备好进行交易。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is on track to include India in its emerging market debt index from June with most of its clients ready to trade, according to the firm’s global head of index research.】
